a.title: Press enter to skip to the Navigation

span.style: font-size: 18pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;

p.span: WEIMAR INDEPENDENT SCHOOL DISTRICT

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;

p.span: 506 W. Main Street – Weimar, Texas 78962

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;

p.span: Phone 979-725-6306/ Fax 979-725-8737/ www.weimarisd.org

span.style: font-size: 18pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; text-decoration: underline; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;

p.span: COVID-19 Response Plan

span.style: font-size: 12.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: as of Monday, March 23, 2020, 8:00 am

span.style: font-size: 12.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: COVID-19 is an evolving situation, and changes and modifications to this plan may occur.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;

p.span: School Closure

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 271px; height: 154px; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Based on the recent action of Governor Greg Abbott, Weimar ISD campuses and school activities will be closed until May 4, 2020.

span.style: background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Your continued support in the days ahead is greatly appreciated.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

li.span: Weekly assignments are due each Friday, and may be picked up all day at each respective campus on Fridays.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

li.span: Weimar ISD meals continue to be served Mon - Fri from 11:30 am - 12:30 pm.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: The Weimar ISD community must work together to fight COVID-19.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Head to http://tea.texas.gov/staywell for vitally important public health guidance to stop the spread.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: If we stand apart as a community now, we will be together again soon.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
text-align: center;
text-decoration: underline;

em.span: Please practice Patience, Kindness, and Safety!

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
text-decoration: underline;
font-size: 14pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;

p.span: Weimar ISD Meal Distribution

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 238px; height: 136px; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Weimar ISD wants to support our school community by providing a free breakfast and lunch for our WISD families. Beginning Wednesday, March 25, 2020, to all children ages 0-18.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Meals will be available for pickup at Weimar Elementary (515 W. Main) through the circle drive nearest the cafeteria. Pickup will be from 11:30 am - 12:30 pm Monday thru Friday. District staff will deliver food to the vehicle; families will not need to exit the vehicle to receive the meals.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Children do not have to

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: be present in the car to receive the meal.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: We will do our best to accommodate all children while supplies last.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 14pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;

p.span: Instructional Support

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 117px; height: 117px; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Parents and students are accountable for the learning of their students to the full extent possible during this extended school closure.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Teachers, counselors, and administrators will continue to be available for the duration of the school closure via email and Remind message. Teacher and staff email addresses and Remind codes can be found on the district website, schools, staff websites.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: The district is working to meet all federal guidelines to tailor instruction for students with special needs. If your child needs support, please email the special education director, Amanda Turlington at

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

div.p: Packets and assignments are due every Friday. Should you wish to submit the packet electronically, please email the assignment to the classroom teacher. Students are required to complete all assignments and turn them in weekly. We promise to work together with everyone to continually evaluate and adjust the process to best meet everyone’s needs.

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: 18px; color: #c00000;

em.span: Grades 3-12 will be using Google Classroom to deliver educational content and materials.

div.p: You can access Google Classroom using a computer, tablet or cellular device. Google Classroom has an app that can be downloaded to tablets or phones to make access easy. To join your teacher's Google Classroom, look for a remind from your teacher.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;
font-size: 14pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif;

p.span: STAAR and End-of-Course (EOC) Exams

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 174px; height: 99px; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #1c1e21;

p.span: Governor Abbott announced that STAAR assessments are waived for the 2019-2020 school year. Additionally, he is requesting that the U.S. Department of Education waive the federal testing requirements. This includes all forms and subjects of STAAR. TEA will provide guidance on graduation requirements as they relate to EOC assessments, and we will update seniors as information becomes available.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Arial Black', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21;

p.span: Blinn Dual Credit

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21;

font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 142px; height: 80px; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #1c1e21;

p.span: Blinn dual credit Students will continue online beginning Monday, March 23rd. They will be using their eCampus accounts. Students already have access to their established accounts through Blinn.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #1c1e21;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #1c1e21;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #1c1e21;
background-color: #ffffff; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.div:
Jon Wunderlich, Superintendent
Weimar Independent School District
506 West Main Street
Weimar, Texas 78962
Phone: 979.725.9504

Weimar ISD shall be a community nurturing academic excellence for all students and demonstrating leadership in character development. Students’ potential will be maximized in order to grow life-long learners and productive citizens.
